title: Steinbeisser Experimental Gastronomy
description: Steinbeisser hosts a series of evenings taking place once every season at the Lloyd Hotel & Cultural Embassy. It caters a plant-based (vegan) 5-course menu made from local and bio-dynamic grown grains, vegetables, and fruits. For each edition two artists are invited to create exclusive dishware and cutlery, who will change the eating experience in a thought-provoking manner. A 5-course menu for around 27 euros and capacity of 25 guests per evening. 2003 dates are May 10, 11, and 12 at 19:00 taking place on the 2nd floor in room 222. Email reservation to info@steinbeisser.org or shoes41.42@gmail.com.
